> Hydras was stuck by the spark collector's ray and he screamed in 
> pain,=
 Darkhawk rushed towards the machine and took a feather missile. 
> Using i=
t as a blade, he aimed towards the spark collector hoping to 
> stop it. 

=
The beam hit Hydras, but unlike what happened with Myrmidon, the machine di=
d not completly achieve=A0its goal.=A0Instead the beam blackened, and then =
turned red as smoke came from the device, and finally the beam shut down, a=
chieving only partial success.

Darkhawk's feather blade now sliced cleanly=
 into the machine, scoring it gravely along its flanks. The machine buzzed =
once, then a second time, then rose quickly into the air, unable to complet=
e extraction of Hydras' spark!

(TAG: Hydras, Darkhawk)

OOC: Thanks, I got=
 what=A0I needed. Don't forget myrmidon is still laying on the ground, he w=
as the first hit by the extractor.
